abstract: With $140 billion in cash at stake, Apple and the hedge fund manager David Einhorn have been acting strangely.
snippet: With $140 billion in cash at stake, Apple and the hedge fund manager David Einhorn have been acting strangely.
lead_paragraph: The fight over Apple’s $140 billion cash pile is proving the adage that money can make people do strange things.

headline.main: Unusual Moves in Confronting Apple’s Huge Pile of Cash
headline.print_headline: Unusual Moves in Confronting Apple’s Mountain of Cash
